about_the_game:
Abnormality is the authentic realistic multiplayer ghost-hunting horror experience. Jump in with friends as you explore abandoned locations in search of proof that ghosts exist.

Immersive Ghost-Hunting Experience
Step into the shoes of a group of young enthusiastic urban explorers, equipped with the best in business ghost hunting tools they could find online. Your mission is to team up with up to 3 of your friends to explore abandoned locations and use your smarts to gather compelling evidence of the supernatural. But tread carefully—these locations are not as empty as they seem.

Darkness and Sound
Darkness and sound are your greatest enemies in Abnormality. The abandoned places you are visiting no longer have power, so you must use your night vision goggles to pierce through the pitch black and navigate the haunted locales. You must remain quiet as the spirits follow your every step. Cover your mouth to muffle your breathing, avoid making loud sounds both in game and through your microphone and use all your skills as a budding ghost hunting aficionado to get evidence and get out.

Voice recognition
With unique voice recognition, Abnormality allows players to speak in game to alter their way through the gameplay. Speak directly to the ghost through spirit boxes or by crying out to it through your microphone. The game is in your hands and what you say will directly alter the gameplay experience!

Are You Ready to Face the Unknown?
In Abnormality, the line between the living and the dead is thin, and the dangers are real. Gather your courage, assemble your team, and prepare to confront the paranormal head-on. Will you uncover the truth, or will you become another lost soul trapped in the darkness? The choice is yours.

short_description: Abnormality is an authentic & realistic multiplayer ghost-hunting horror game. Explore fully abandoned locations, investigate, and find evidence of the paranormal, but beware—the former residents may not appreciate your intrusion. Use night vision goggles to navigate through the pitch darkness.
